00054 // header: parameters, functions, etc for generating covariate normalization
00055 // predictors and making predictions for correction factors
00056 
00057 void td(const std::vector<double> &v);

00059 /** this class holds information required to make predictions on new snps for normalization */
00060 class NormalizationPredictor{
00061 public:
00062         // information required to make predictions on new SNPs in a given experiment
00063         // vector for aa,ab,bb genotypes
00064         // sigma for each genotype
00065         std::vector<double> fitAA; ///< prediction function for AA
00066         std::vector<double> fitAB; ///< prediction function for AB
00067         std::vector<double> fitBB; ///< prediction function for BB
00068         // detect genotype by distance scaled by sigma
00069         std::vector<double> sigma; ///< sigma within each genotype
00070         // offset for covariates
00071         // covariates are centered for predictor
00072         std::vector<double> CenterCovariates; ///< mean values for covariates
00073         // where are the true centers supposed to be
00074         std::vector<double> TargetCenter; ///< where are the true centers.
00075 
00076         void MakeCov(std::vector<double> &cov,const double Strength);
00077         double MakePrediction(const double Contrast,const std::vector<double> &cov);
00078         void Copy(NormalizationPredictor &Source);
00079         void Dump(std::ostream &out);
00080 };
00081 
00082 /** Holds some useful values in relation to each other */
00083 class NormalizationFrame{
00084 public:
00085         std::vector<double> Contrast; ///< want to predict this value
00086         // covariates
00087         std::vector<double> Strength; ///< using this value
00088 
00089         // vector of contrast
00090         // matrix of covar
00091         NormalizationPredictor ThisFit; ///< functions for predicting
00092         // fill in contrasts
00093         // fill in covariates
00094         // build normalization predictor
00095         void FillInCovariates(const std::vector<double> &S);
00096         void FillInContrast(const std::vector<double> &v);      
00097         void FitEM();
00098 };
